title: FSX Captain Sim 727 Pro Pack 2.1 w/VC
description:
Ok guys so there was this really hidden torrent hosted on isohunt that contained the 727 Pro Pack install that took about a week for me to download because there were no seeds and it had like 2-3 leechers at the time and when I finally downloaded the whole thing it was a repackage of the pro pack by Komu only he decided to be a fucking asshole and put a password on it. So being extremely frustrated that another Pirater decided to be a douche I shit on his protection and cracked the installer. 

How to INSTALL:

Open up the main folder that comes in the download and there should be 4 other folders in there called 

Captain_Sim
Effects
Gauges
SimObjects


Just copy these 4 folders into the MAIN FSX directory and do nothing else, load up FSX and enjoy.



And before anyone bitches at me, I downloaded the torrent originally to fucking use it, and I am using it right now so I KNOW it works, dont comment on here bitching at me that it doesn't work because I know for a fact that it works.
